1. Keir Starmer has kept Donald Trump on side - is it coming back to bite him?  BBC
  2. Martin Rowson on Keir Starmer’s relationship with Donald Trump – cartoon  The Guardian
  3. The US and UK are joined at the hip. Neither government seems to realise that  The Telegraph

item.title: Karl Bushby's 'mixed feelings' as 36,000-mile journey nears end - BBC
item.description:
1. Karl Bushby's 'mixed feelings' as 36,000-mile journey nears end  BBC
  2. The incredible journey of a man who spent 27 years walking around the world without using any means of transportation.  CPG Click Petróleo e Gás
  3. Karl Bushby: the long walk home  BBC
  4. How 2026 will mark the end of a Hull man’s very long walk home, 28 years after he left  Hull Live
  5. Meet Karl Bushby, the man who walks the earth  dailynews.co.za
